DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is: - to establish etiology of acute aseptic meningitis/meningoencephalitis in Slovenia - to assess the clinical course and outcome of tick-borne encephalitis and Lyme neuroborreliosis - to characterize the inflammatory proteins, gene polymorphisms, and transcriptome profiles in patients with tick-borne encephalitis and Lyme neuroborreliosis
DOC.criteria: clinical picture compatible with aseptic meningitis/meningoencephalitis age 18 years or older clear cerebrospinal fluid on macroscopic examination cerebrospinal pleocytosis (> 5 x 106 white blood cells per liter) younger than 18 years pregnant women
